jobs.jobDescription: Applications are invited for the post of Embedded - C/Linux. Location: Ahmedabad, Bangalore, Hyderabad/ Secunderabad, Noida, Pune, Indore, Jaipur. Experience: 5-10 years. Experience in Advanced scripting skills to automate jobs (start, stop, recycle, deploy, etc.). Good understanding of JVM, troubleshooting, and performance tuning through thread dump and log analysis Knowledge of network infrastructure for e.g. TCP/IP, DNS, Firewall, router, load balancer, etc. Understanding of clusters, Virtual Hosts, JDBC, auto-deployment, session replication, URL redirections, Re-write rules, Http-plugins, security certificates, etc.

jobs.jobDescription:
Applications are invited for the post of Finance Manager. Requirements: 
•	We are looking for a reliable Finance Manager that will play a dual role of being the Finance Controller responsible for finance and cost, and Strategic Finance Partner providing inputs and recommendations to the Management on data-backed decision making.
•	Responsible for the accounting and book-keeping function that will continue to be outsourced to a CA firm.
•	The incumbent will be responsible to oversee the accounting, and ensure monthly closing of books of accounts.
•	Provide monthly, quarterly and annual financial and operational reports; interpret and recommend operational changes in the organization and future course of action.
•	Design and implement a MIS system in the company - Analyze costs, pricing, variable contributions, sales results, and the company’s actual performance compared to the business plans.
•	Develop trends and projections for the firm’s finances.
•	Conduct reviews and evaluations for cost-reduction opportunities. 
•	Oversee operations of the finance and accounts team, set goals and objectives, and design a framework for these to be met.
•	Manage the preparation of the company’s annual budget.
•	Report each month with a comparison of the budget explaining the major variances, highlighting wins and losses.
•	Liaise with auditors to ensure appropriate monitoring of company finances is maintained.
•	Liaise with bankers and funders for maintaining the debt facility of the company.
•	Support Investor Relations by responding to queries raised by Investors.
•	Liaison with the Potential and Existing Investors / Donors / Financial Institutions for the Financial Due-Diligence activities, as and when required.
•	Correspond with various other departments, discussing company plans and agreeing on future paths to be taken.
•	Proven experience as a Financial Manager.
•	Extensive understanding of financial trends and general market patterns Proficient use of finance software (Tally, Zoho, or other cloud-based software).
•	Strong working knowledge of all statutory legislation and regulations. Job Location: Work from home.

events.eventName: Mom's Let’s Talk Career - Bringing Mom Back to Career World!
events.eventDescription:
This Mother’s Day, Her Second Innings is excited to celebrate “Her Moment” the sacrifices and success of mothers with a special event designed for women who wish to get back to work after a career break. The challenges that sabbatical women who wish to return to the workforce face are undeniable, and the need to make women financially independent, emotionally strong, and socially empowered, is pressing.

An exciting career guidance session with Manjula Dharmalingam, Founder, Her Second Innings, and Jennifer Moses, Counselling Psychologist, Her Second Innings to help participants navigate their career comeback
events.event_speaker_designation: Founder - Her Second Innings and Counselling Psychologists- Her Second Innings

events.eventName: How can Women Prepare for Interviews after a Career Break
events.eventDescription:
"What if I cannot answer about the latest happenings in my field?” 

“I may have forgotten many things about my work. I can never compete with today’s generation in my job search.” 

These are some real apprehensions that several Women who have taken a career break have. Sometimes they share their concerns, other times it is even embarrassing to voice them. This Mother’s Day, let us make it meaningful for those who have had to leave their careers for motherhood. Let us explore “How can Women Prepare for Interviews after a Career Break”.

FlexiBees is a Talent Platform that helps Women return to work after a career break by matching them to meaningful and flexible roles (www.flexibees.com). This webinar will be hosted by Deepa N. Swamy, Co-Founder, FlexiBees, and based on whose initial returnship experience FlexiBees was started. She will be having a conversation with two seasoned professionals who have successfully returned to work after a career break and have immense experience in helping candidates do so as well. Ruchika Malhotra, Senior Recruitment Manager, FlexiBees, and Pranoti Nayar, Insights Manager, FlexiBees, will be sharing the knowledge, experience, and wisdom from their own journeys, as well as from those of several hundred who have crossed the chasm of a career break. Join us on 6th May from 3:30 PM to 4:15 PM (IST).
events.event_speaker_name: Deepa N Swamy - Co-founder, FlexiBees,  Ruchika Malhotra - Senior Recruitment Manager, FlexiBees and Pranoti Nayar - Insights Manager, FlexiBees.

course.course_desc:
CD RISE: 
Our certification program for young women stepping forward on their journey as Corporate Divas. Cd Rise is a 4-week intensive corporate readiness program taught by experienced women leaders. Having worked with several interns over decades, we realize that though generation next is high on potential and competencies, they tend to miss making their mark in the organizations they’ve interned with. This is so because of the lack of exposure to life skills along with several corporate efficiency traits that they are yet to discover. This program, therefore, connects the dots and caters to the need for a finishing school for young women getting ready to start their careers and hence blur gender gaps in their formative years at work itself.

 

CORPORATE DIVA: 
A 2-day self-development journey, on self-evaluation,  activation, and calming of the inner critique for emerging women leaders to enable them to rise higher on their professional ladder, embrace leadership more effectively, and create impact. It aims at enhancing their strength, competence, intellect, and caliber which women most often underplay at work. Recently an extension of the program has pivoted online called CDx

CD PLUS: 
An intense, 3-month step-up program for Senior women in leadership. To a large extent, these women have successfully shattered the glass ceiling, however, what lies ahead for them to encounter, might be the Glass Cliff. The CD PLUS Program is a deep dive into the key areas that more significantly contribute to gender inequality statistics. The program is a superb amalgamation of digital assessments,  master classes brought forth by experts par excellence, along with interactions with mentors, intense coaching, and buddy support from the Corporate Diva Tribe. All in all CD PlUS+ is that one intense program that sets  you up, above the rest  for what it takes to show the mettle of a competent  woman LEADER

 

REDISCOVER THE DIVA IN YOU: 
A one-day activation session followed by a 2-month intense program for women returning back to work after sabbatical/layoff/ready to re-start. While the activation session gives them a flavor of how we can enable them to come up the curve, the 2-month Diva Re-start program is the compounding of knowledge, skills, best practices, clarity, direction, network, and coaching from highly acclaimed professionals. This program not only focuses on getting your mindset ready for re-start but also on getting you all set to shine bright to the best version of your employable self, and leverage every opportunity that comes your way. The participants are further directed to and connected with our partner avenues that specialize in returning career employment, therefore driving end-to-end results.

 

CDE (Exclusively for Self Employed/Women entrepreneurs)
14% of 58.5 million entrepreneurs in India are women. These women-owned enterprises provide employment to 13.45 million people. Yet only 2% of start-up funding on average goes to women lead startups. The CDE program is beyond the core competency development of women entrepreneurs. Our focus is to instill critical skills, that as innovative thinking, thought leadership, conflict management, crisis leadership and most importantly enabling them to build a strong personal brand. This is brought forth through interactive sessions with industry experts, further to which chords are connected with coaches, mentors, and incubation partners, resulting in holistic development.

Image Consulting is the profession of helping people create powerful and positive first impressions to get more opportunities in life. Soft Skills Training is the profession of training people to perform better when these opportunities present themselves. With numerous researches concluding that Image Management and Soft Skills contribute to 85% in the success of an individual, the potential of Image Consulting and Soft Skills Training is tremendous.
Not only one can create a huge impact on lives of people, one can earn quite handsomely. If you wish to evaluate your earning potential as an Image Consultant and Soft Skills Trainer, you can do so by taking this assessment https://bit.ly/3w3vcDx .

Course Outline:

  1. ICBI’s Business Program in Soft Skills Training
    Duration: 7 Months
    15 topics of most essential soft skills and an exhaustive Train the Trainer program.
    Certification: ICBI, SQA (Scottish Qualifications Authority), NABET (National Accreditation Board for Education & Training), a constituent board of QCI (Quality Council of India)

  2. Business Program in Image Consulting
    Duration: 8 Months
    24 modules covering the physical, psychological, social and aesthetical aspects of Image Management, client consulting mocks and a comprehensive Train the Consultant program
    Certification: ICBI, Conselle Institute of Image Management, USA, NABET (National Accreditation Board for Education & Training), a constituent board of QCI (Quality Council of India)

    All ICBI Business Programs come with Business Enablement Support:
    Business training to start market and grow your independent Image Consulting & Soft Skills training practice, readymade consulting and training material, directory listing on ICBI website for Image Consultants and Soft Skills Trainers, eligibility for empanelment for captive internal and external assignments and ongoing handholding support.

course.course_title: Post Graduate Management Programme for Women (PGMPW)
course.course_desc:
Post Graduate Management Programme for Women (PGMPW) is an accelerated general management programme for women who wish to return to a professional career.
It is an innovative management programme crafted exclusively for women who have taken a career break and now seek to return to a corporate role.

The programme was launched by SPJIMR in 2016. SPJIMR is a top ranked school of management known for its unique pedagogy that helps build socially sensitive business leaders. It is rated among top 3 business schools in India.

In the short time since its launch, the programme has stood out for its unique design, intensive curriculum and wide-ranging industry partnerships. The all-women class of PGMPW has participants who are inspired, perseverant and ready to make a mark as they return to take up leadership positions in the corporate world.
In doing so, the participant’s help corporates add to their leadership pipeline, make it more diverse and enable businesses draw from the varied experience that returning women bring to the workplace.

If you are eligible and looking for a qualification that can accelerate your return to a corporate role, and at an institution with outstanding credentials, the PGMPW is the right programme for you.

The programme is 11-month full time programme, offered at the SPJIMR Mumbai Campus.This postgraduate management programme (with residential option) prepares participants to return to the corporate world. The programme focuses on General Management with concentration in the functional area.

The programme incorporates varied pedagogy including case method, lectures, seminars, simulations, experiential workshops, role plays and group exercises.

The programme offers global exposure through 6-day immersion programme at University of St. Gallen, Zurich, Switzerland. During the immersion, students would attend leadership courses offered by world renowned professors, visit local & multinational corporations, network with business leaders and attend community events.

During the programme, career services are offered and participants are prepared not just for the next job but life-time employability.
course.providerName: S P Jain Institute of Management and Research (SPJIMR)

course.course_desc:
Ready to Become a Solopreneur
Here is your first step to get you started !

Course Learnings:
- How to Find Interest for becoming Solopreneur
- Spotting Successful Business Opportunities
- Finding Peer Network to Practice
- Getting the Right Mentors to Boost Confidence
- Keys to Successful Solopreneur Journey
- Team Building to share the Vision

COURSE CONTENT:

RH294 Red Hat Linux Automation with Ansible
IT automation is key to managing large numbers of systems and applications efficiently and consistently at scale. This course develops the skills needed to efficiently operate and more easily scale the organization's dynamic IT infrastructure, accelerate application time to value, and rapidly adapt and implement needed innovation through DevOps practices.

OUTLINE DETAILS:

This course will help you master Ansible for the purpose of automation, configuration, and management 

  • Install and configure Ansible or Red Hat Ansible Engine on a control node
  • Create and manage inventories of managed hosts, as well as prepare them for Ansible automation
  • Run individual ad hoc automation tasks from the command line
  • Write Ansible Playbooks to consistently automate multiple tasks and apply them to managed hosts
  • Parameterize playbooks using variables and facts, and protect sensitive data with Ansible Vault
  • Write and reuse existing Ansible roles to simplify playbook creation and reuse code
  • Automate common Red Hat Enterprise Linux system administration tasks using Ansible

Get Skilled for the most in-demand technology and become industry ready.

Course Content:
- Module 1 - Core Java and JDBC
In this section you'll learn:
• Basic programming concept
• Class, Objects
• OOPS Concepts
• Packages
• Exception Handling
• String, String Buffer, String Builder
•Collection Framework
• GIT
• JDBC (SQL)

- Module 2 - Back End Development
• Servlets
• JSP
• Spring
• Spring Boot
• Hibernate

COURSE CURRICULUM

  • RPA BASICS
    - RPA Basics,Variables & Data Types
    - Data Manipulation
    - Excel & Data Tables
    - UI Automation & Selectors
    - Email Automation
    - Invoke Workflows & Arguments
    - Orchestrator Basics & Assessments
    - Capstone Project I

 

  • RPA ADVANCED
    - PDF Automation
    - State Machines & Libraries
    - Introduction To Document Understanding
    - Parameterization Using Configuration Files
    - Orchestrator Queues
    - Basics Of RE Framework
    - RE Framework Project / Mini Assignment
    - Capstone Project II

Who should take this course:
- Professionals who are seeking to pursue a career in SalesForce
- Admintrators responsible for the set - up , configuration and mantainence of their organisations SalesForce applications.
- Other groups that woudl benefit from depending their knowledge of SalesForce including Power users, Sales Operations and IT. 

Benefits of the course:
- Tutor based training
- Milestones Dashboard
- Easy Job Connect
- SalesForce Training
- Industry Exposure
- Project Experience

The key to developing a competitive advantage in today's fast-changing world and getting ready for Industry 4.0 is continuous knowledge up-gradation and reskilling. There are various methods to acquire this, viz. full-time classroom education, part-time and hybrid models of knowledge delivery. K J Somaiya Institute of Management, ranked among the top 25 business schools in India and top 10 private business schools, located on a lush green 50 acres campus in Mumbai, offers several sector-specific MBA programmes through various modes of delivery. K J Somaiya Institute of Management, a constituent college under the Somaiya Vidyavihar University (SVU) since Aug 2019 (https://university.somaiya.edu/en), continues its legacy of offering world-class management education.

This course is a 15 months full time General Management Programme. Its objective is to develop leadership competencies for dynamic business environment of 21st century. It inculcates decision- making skills for all managerial roles and functions across verticals.

Programme Highlights :

  • Illustrious Board of Studies
  • Industry Internship and Master's Thesis
  • Harvard Case Bank
  • Bloomberg lab for market simulation
  • Simulations, workshops, industry visits, projects
  • International Immersions Programme

Key Takeaways of the Programme:

  • Formulate a holistic approach to identifying problems, formulating solutions and adapting to change
  • Build strategic skills for effective decision making with strategy development and implementation focus.
  • Develop a personal leadership philosophy that reflects more excellent knowledge, capabilities and insights.
  • Expand the capability to lead cross-functional teams and corporate projects across challenging local and global markets.
  • Gain in-depth knowledge of business functions and build general management skills to integrate these functions across the organisation.
  • Examine newer techniques for driving results throughout the company across any market or business cycle.
  • Focus on Leadership, Strategy & Digitalisation

Admission Process:

The admission process is a simple 4 - step process that starts with applying for K J Somaiya Institute of Management's MBA Executive programme.

Eligibility Criteria

CAT/XAT/CMAT/GMAT/NMAT

Candidates applying through NMAT and GMAT are required to select K J Somaiya Institute of Management as one of the Institutes for sending their scores in NMAT and GMAT application forms/portals, respectively.

* For NMAT, the scores of only 1st attempt of the candidate will be considered.

* Valid scores forthe last three years are accepted for GMAT

* Minimum 5 years of Work Experience after graduation is mandatory
